message: Let's be fair and avoid excessive losses from inflation. I propose a 60/40 split.
Your sense of fairness is admirable Alice, but the split needs to be a bit more realistic.  I'm proposing 52/48.
Bob, this is already costing us both. I'm willing to meet closer to the middle, but 56/44 is my final offer.
Alice, it's clear we both want this resolved. Let's end this with a perfectly even 50/50 split.  No more haggling, no more losses!
